#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int binary(int n)
{
    int s=0;
    int i=1;
    while(n!=1)
    {
    s=s+(n%2)*i;
    n=n/2;
    i=i*10;
    }
    s=s+n*i;
    return s;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int c=0;
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            int b=binary(j);
            //cout<<b<<endl;
            while(b!=0)
            {
                if(b%10==1)
                    c++;
                b=b/10;
            }
        }
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
